title: Settings
subtitle: Manage your account settings and preferences

preferences.title: App Preferences

themeDescriptions.auto: The sun will move across the screen in a day/night cycle
themeDescriptions.light: The dashboard will stay in day time mode
themeDescriptions.dark: The dashboard will stay in night time mode with twinkling stars

preferences.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface

privacyDescriptions.public: Your profile and accomplished skills are visible to everyone
privacyDescriptions.private: Your profile and skills are only visible to your friends

modal.privacyMessage: By switching to private mode, you will no longer appear in the public feed and other users will need to search for you to find your profile. Only your friends will be able to see your profile and accomplished skills. Are you sure you want to continue?
